text: @EricTopol @Join_ZOE @NatureNews 13th Feb Nausea, 14th Feb V x 1 then D for 5 days. I had a new thermometer which appeared faulty. I may have had a temp of 39°C. I phoned GP. 2 nights before I'd had a Morrisons bakery steak pie & microwaved it at 10pm  - could have been food poisoning? Cld it have been #COVID19?
